website_summaries.verdict: Those seeking a document tube that provides excellent grip and protection will appreciate this high-quality model.
pros: Built with a textured, ridged design that offers remarkable grip for customers carrying high-stake documents
Adjusts to 10 different lengths with locking device
Telescoping end barrel for supreme security

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great document storage or transportation tube. The plastic is somewhat lightweight so if you need a tube with reinforced walls for crush resistance, you may want to upgrade, but for most people and purposes, this is an overall excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Tom  Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Holds arrows
customer_reviews.text: Holds about 30 arrows. Perfect for moving or going to the range and not having to worry about your fletching being ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Hellequinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shooting range targets
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store and tote targets to and from the range. It’s perfect. Keeps targets clean and dry. They do get a slight curl to them but I just quickly roll them backwards before hanging and shooting. Accommodates both small and large targets.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Parks

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I use it to transport the targets for the gun range. It looks like a bazooka. They don't sell those rounds at the gun range I had him looking though.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: Great Item to use at conventions to haul purchased art ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Item to use at conventions to haul purchased art works. Slow shipping however so add that into your plans if ordering.
customer_reviews.author: chris ahrendt

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product At A Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This item is of very good quality. I obtained this Art Tube to offer protection to some historic documents that were being transported to Scotland. It worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph W.

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to waterproof...or sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Ad claims to be waterproof, not even water resistant...hole in bottom of tube and collar at tube extension leaks like a sieve...don't put anything you care about in here. Also, super cheap and flimsy...lock doesn't work so it randomly extends and contracts...also bends and flattens for no reason...when completely extended the strap is too short to do anything but act as a bad handle. Was not worth the money, should have just made my own out of PVC pipe!
customer_reviews.author: CWR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job really well but is not heavy duty or sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I rode with it on my back with my motorcycle and it did not open. Is really handy the option that make it longer to hold bigger posters. But is not heavy duty at all and I’m afraid that it will open or become shorter loosing my papers or smashing them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: They are not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are kind of flimsy. But to some extent I expected that. When they say "waterproof" that is totally misleading. There is no seal between the lid and the main container. At best water resistant in a rain but not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: H T

customer_reviews.title: Does the work
customer_reviews.text: I use this to protect my boon pole when traveling. It doesn’t protect. But I have to tape it so it doesn’t extend or shorten. The built quality is flimsy. It will does the job but you will have to deal with the nonsense
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: They were what I needed, met the application but are somewhat a light gauge
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, They are very adequate for what I wanted them for. They are good enough to protect the documents for long term storage. (by that I meant, I will seldom be accessing the prints, so they are inserted and left alone)
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great telescoping case
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my target paper for shooting. It does tend to leave the paper a bit rolled but I can easily flatten them. The case is sturdy and lightweight. It also has a strap which comes in handy when I'm carrying my gear to the shooting range.
customer_reviews.author: beefsteak

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t lock quite as well as I anticipated but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert peters

customer_reviews.title: Works but not the quality i wanted
customer_reviews.text: the product works for what I need to transport my architectural maps and drawings, however I had hoped that the tube would be a little more durable, including the strap. This morning was the first time I used it and the strap is extremely flimsy and even fell out. I had to tie a knot to use it as a strap and it is extremely thin. For long term use, I will either need to replace the strap so its easier to carry or buy a new transport tube
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good way to store/carry targets!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to carry targets to and from the shooting range for many months now. It's been doing the job quite nicely. Now, keep in mind, it's only rigid plastic, it's not metal or some other "heavy-duty" material - so if you start banging it around like a gorilla in a cage, it may not hold up. But if you just act like a human (lol), it should last for many years! Personally? I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product was described as "Waterproof" yet has a hole in the bottom of it. I was suspicious of it being water proof since it's expandable. Product summary is a blatant lie.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wall very thin
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on the tube is much thinner that I expected. Not heavy to carry, but feels like it could be crushed and cracked easily.
customer_reviews.author: GM92

customer_reviews.title: Opening
customer_reviews.text: The tube is really nice and easy to use, but when we first opened the tube we had some problems finding where to twist because we didn't realize the strap was set to be tight enough that the tube won't open. We had loosened it a bit but you need to loosen it several inches, not just an inch or two, in order to remove the cap. I think that from now on if they put a little sheet just explaining that to people it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: It's Expandable.
customer_reviews.text: Better protection than cardboard tubes. I use these to hold my vintage posters.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- Awful odor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Exactly as described! I trust this to protect my documents during transit. Cons: Awful plastic smell upon removing from packaging. I separated the parts and let them air out for a couple days before carrying it for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who plays Lacrosse had to travel by air and this was a perfect product to protect her stick to go in the luggage while traveling
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and rugged.
customer_reviews.text: I use for my large gaming mats that cover a table..works great
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction material
customer_reviews.text: I had a a few issues with this product. You can't tell from the picture but this is pretty thin plastic. It feels really cheap. The strap is also really short.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that the case was telescoping so that I could put different size posters in it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item also was perfect for my daughters needs as an architect student.
customer_reviews.author: capricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased these before, and will again. No surprises, what you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use it to store and transport battlemats for d&d
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for conference posters
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect to carry an academic poster to a conference across the US
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This Tube is perfect for traveling with blueprints. It is really well made and was easy to carry onto the plane. It has a nice shoulder strap for ease of carry.
customer_reviews.author: KulaLani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust to suit different drawing lengths
customer_reviews.text: Arrives promptly, well packaged and does exactly as it says. Easy to adjust to suit different drawing lengths. Kept my drawings safe on a three-leg transatlantic flight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money
customer_reviews.text: Product is made with very light weight plastic, I do not expect it will last long. I purchased to carry targets to the range, and it feels very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Good case for important papers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case at a decent price to hold important papers. Used to store blueprints for house.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamM

customer_reviews.title: Easy portability
customer_reviews.text: Would like it to be thicker plastic, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: ... (being very picky) but overall it has been a good product that serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: It works for transporting large paper although the lock is not 100% tight (being very picky) but overall it has been a good product that serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I needed and the fact that it extends is pèrfect. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but cheap. It hasn't failed but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Functional, but cheap. It hasn't failed but I don't trust it. OK for short term use.
customer_reviews.author: John Averitt

customer_reviews.title: It worked really well at first and seemed sturdy. But the red ring at the top the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well at first and seemed sturdy. But the red ring at the top the strap is attached to broke after only 2 uses, so now the strap can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Great poster carrier
customer_reviews.text: Portable, light and good value for money. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: it'll do
customer_reviews.text: was hoping for thicker more sturdy plastic, kind of thin, but should work
customer_reviews.author: midcentury modern

customer_reviews.title: The whole box was in bad shape. Will write a reclamation
customer_reviews.text: Box was broken and Cap was smashed. The whole box was in bad shape. Will write a reclamation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tube itself is not particularly sturdy and can easily warp the artwork inside
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heavy duty poster tube that I could take to concerts and not have to worry about. The top of this tube falls off, even when it is locked. The tube itself is not particularly sturdy and can easily warp the artwork inside.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Werlin

product_meta.title: Drawing Tube Blueprint Case DEWEL Telescoping Art Tube Large Plastic Black Storage Tube Expands from 24 to 40 Inches Plastic Waterproof and Light Resistant Poster Tube with Strap
product_meta.description: DEWEL Expandable Storage Tube is made of high quality durable and sturdy plastic, which is waterproof and light-resistant. The telescoping carrying case could expand from 24" up to 40" with adjustable interlock, and it has adjustable shoulder strap allowing for easy mobility and transportation. The Plastic Tube could be used for storing/ moving/ transporting/ travelling/ carrying art works/ documents/ posters and so on.
feature_bullets: Telescoping carrying case could extend from 24 inches to 40 inches in length, and the diameter is 3.15”, so handle various poster dimensions.
Easy Interlock Design: The tube could be adjusted to 10 different lengths, easily and firmly lock your favorite poster in the tube case safely.
This telescoping document carrier keeps your posters, artwork, and documents from becoming bent or creased while you're on the go.
Waterproof, hard, durable storage tube leaves your mind at ease when traveling with precious documents or art.
The adjustable shoulder strap makes it easy for anyone to carry this poster transport tube.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
